Name: Dragon Fang
Desc:
The remains of Devil Dragon drawn by the Smell of Death get materialized as fangs, and spread more deaths. Dragon Fang is summoned when a certain number of Kaine's direct attacks hit. It does not affect enemies in the Damage Reflection status and first targets the enemy with the highest HP.
It follows Kaine when moving out of range. It is removed upon moving maps, but it gains the required attack hits for creation based on the remaining duration.
Can be toggled On/Off.
Lv. 20 Effect: Can learn the 5th Job skill, Grip of Agony

H.Old:
Summon for 40 sec.
When Kaine's direct attack hits, changes to attack mode and moves towards target enemies and triggers Dragon Bite, attacking enemies at 110% Damage 4 times. After activating attack mode, casts Dragon Bite up to 7 times and returns dealing 50% more damage on normal monsters.
Can summon up to 3.
Attack Mode Cooldown: 3 sec.
H.New:
Summoned for 40 sec.
When Kaine's direct Attack skill hits, enters Attack mode, moves to a target, and activates Dragon Bite that attacks at 110% Damage 4 times. After entering Attack mode, casts Dragon Bite up to 7 times before returning. Normal Monster Damage +50%.
Up to 3 can be summoned.
Attack Mode Cooldown: 3 sec.
